name: ifeq1d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), cif(c2, c1, w1)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), cif(c2, c1, w1)), wceq(c0, c2))
stmt.pretty: syl(w0, if(w1, c0, c1)= if(w1, c2, c1), c0 = c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), cif(c2, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), cif(c2, c1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), cif(c2, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), cif(c2, c1, w1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), cif(c2, c1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), cif(c2, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))

comment: Equality deduction for conditional operator. (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-2005.)
